Welcome!

This is a static HTML page rendered without the Twig template system.

A plain HTML file welcome.html (located at "/app/pages/static/") is being used to display this page.
The Twig template systems is either not installed or disabled in the configuration file.
Make sure to initialize your environment with Composer to load the required modules.

The Twig Template System is not required for this Boilerplate to work.
Even without Twig this is a powerful sandbox to kickstart any PHP related project.

You can modify this file or use the configuration file to point your Welcome Page to a file of your choice.

Please, refer to the documentation for more information.
